                    java.lang.String course,
                    java.lang.String section,
                    double amount)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Add a successful bid into table section-student
        Parameters:
        userid - the id of the student
        course - the course code
        section - the section code
        amount - the amount that the student placed

        java.sql.SQLException

      • retrieveBidsByStudentCourse

        public static Bid retrieveBidsByStudentCourse(java.lang.String userID,
                              java.lang.String course)
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Given a userID and course code, this method returns a bid from Section_Student2 Table. All successful bids during round 2 will be placed into Section_Student2 table. Returns null when no result is found.
        Parameters:
        userid - the id of the student
        Returns:
        a bid object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • retrieveBidsBySection

        public static java.util.List<Bid> retrieveBidsBySection(java.lang.String course,
                                        java.lang.String section)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Given a course id and section this method returns the list of bids for the given course and section in the Section_Student2 table. Results are sorted according to bid amount (Highest to lowest).
        Parameters:
        userid - the id of the student
        Returns:
        the bidding list
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • retrieveAll

        public static java.util.List<Bid> retrieveAll()
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the whole list of successful bids in the Section_Student2 table
        Returns:
        the bidding list
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteSuccessfulBid

        public static void deleteSuccessfulBid(java.lang.String userID,
                       java.lang.String code,
                       java.lang.String sec)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Given a userID, a course ID and section this method deletes the corresponding bid in the Section_Student2 table.
        Parameters:
        userid - the id of the student
        code - the code id eg. IS200
        section - course section eg. S1, S2, S4
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
